channel.title: String Interpolation on Learning Publicly
channel.description: Recent content in String Interpolation on Learning Publicly

item.title: String Interpolation in Python
item.description: Right off the bat, I’ll say this: my go to solution for string interpolation in python are f-strings. They’re elegant, simple to read and even simpler to understand. But in some cases, depending on your setup, you might be forced to use another way. In this article I’ll outline the different possibilities that I have come to learn exist when talking about string interpolation in python. Note: This article is mostly me recopying what is said here: https://www.
